full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA'I SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYIS BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYIS BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED 'DI NI MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS GYIS BSKUL BA RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA'AM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS, BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHID PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I @006A *, ,TSOGS LA 'CHAGS PO BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BAS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAMS PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS BRJOD, ,)
